As my pappy always told me... "If it aint broke don't fix it" D:

I've encountered several problems now, but I solved them all.
With the new crack I couldn't start the game,
but I placed the old crack under the name 'testdrive_crack.exe' in the game folder and I loaded that one while having uplauncher opened and now I can play the game while the patches still work:)
Also, just disconnect internet, after you started the game you can again connect, but this is a precaution because sometimes firewall doesn't block the program properly.
Further, always start the uplauncher, otherwise IT WON'T WORK!
Greets;)
